price: 86. (El padre) contestó: “Solo me quejo de mi angustia y de mi pena ante Al-lah, y sé de Él lo que ustedes no saben.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā ashkū bathī waḥuz'nī ilā al-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
